radiographic_examinations.findings: Nonunion of the medial and lateral epicondylar fragments.
No evidence of loosening, but 22° of valgus angulation of the ulnar component.
Axle assembly disassembly due to fracture of the tongs on the inner pin and fragmented hinge assembly within the olecranon bursa.
Unremarkable findings and satisfactory coronal plane alignment.

radiographic_examinations.date: One year after hinge assembly revision
radiographic_examinations.findings: Fixation of the implants remained secure; static coronal alignment measured 6° of valgus.
